Title: Relates to the duration of orders of protection in cases involving domestic violence
Summary: Relates to duration of orders of protection in cases involving domestic violence.
LawCode: Amd §§842 & 1056, Fam Ct Act; amd §240, Dom Rel L; amd §530.12, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, the domestic relations law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to orders of protection in cases involving domestic violence
